dict.acceptation: 介入，干涉，干预；调解，排解；

sent.orig: Foreign exchange intervention includes direct intervention and indirect intervention carried on by the government.
sent.trans: 外汇市场干预包括政府对外汇市场的直接干预和间接干预。

sent.orig: It explains the validity of the intervention measure through comparing the result between intervention and nonintervention.
sent.trans: 通过对模拟出的“干预”结果与“不干预”的预测结果进行比较，直接说明了将要采取的干预手段的有效性。

sent.orig: From the administrative intervention, China's financial markets are more administrative intervention.
sent.trans: 从行政干预来说，中国行政干预金融市场比较多。

sent.orig: The official also against foreign military intervention intervention in Yemen, saying that could strengthen al-Qaida.
sent.trans: 这位副总理同时还警告外国不要对也门进行军事干涉，否则只会增强基地组织的力量。

sent.orig: Such an intervention would violate a universal law of non-intervention.
sent.trans: 这种干涉干与举动违反了普遍法律的不干涉干与。
